plot: Homeland Security is a cinépoem (video poem) which explores the duality of masking your true identity. Is it better to keep yourself safe and securely hidden behind the facade you present ...
title: Homeland Security: A Cinépoem
plot_es: Homeland Security is a cinépoem (video poem) which explores the duality of masking your true identity. Is it better to keep yourself safe and securely hidden behind the facade you present ...
plot_en: Homeland Security is a cinépoem (video poem) which explores the duality of masking your true identity. Is it better to keep yourself safe and securely hidden behind the facade you present ...
